sense.def: Etiological Agent. of an unexpected, unseasonable climatic warmth. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry ling yang jiao 羚 羊角：療傷寒，時氣寒熱，熱在肌膚，溫風注毒伏在骨間 , “It cures harm caused by cold, [alternating sensations] of cold and heat because of seasonal qi, heat in the muscles and the skin, warmth wind influx with poison abiding in the bones” . Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 4: 遇冬天時行溫風 , 至春夏病熱頭痛 , “If in winter one encounters a warmth wind as seasonal [qi], this will lead to a disease of heat with headache in spring and summer”.
